name: Cosmic Chaos (Scorpion Games)
description:
This was made in a rush for my first game jam, Alakajam #10, I spent several hours on this and wish I could've spent longer.

The  ships follow the cursor, and left click fires bullets.

Background:

You ship's core is unstable, and frequently duplicates itself, dividing its health between itself and the clones. If your original ship (with yellow markings) dies, it's GAME OVER!

Apologies in advance for the lack of content, I don't like releasing something as unfinished as this. The pixel art was rushed and there is no music :(
